freemarkerTextToGlueTransformer.freemarkerTemplate: reference H77_AF009606 <#list rows as row> <#if row.START != "" && row.END != ""> feature-location ${row.PROTEIN} <#assign variationName>Epitope ${row["Epitope name"]}</#assign> <#assign pubmedId>${row[" Pubmed ID"]}</#assign> create variation "${variationName}" -t AMINO_ACID "http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/${pubmedId}" variation "${variationName}" set pattern ${row.Epitope} set location ${row.START} ${row.END} <#assign effectorCellType>${row[" Effector Cell Type"]}</#assign> <#if effectorCellType == "PBMC"> add category epitope_pbmc_effector </#if> <#if effectorCellType == "T cell"> add category epitope_t_cell_effector </#if> <#if effectorCellType == "T cell CD4+"> add category epitope_cd4_t_cell_effector </#if> <#if effectorCellType == "T cell CD8+"> add category epitope_cd8_t_cell_effector </#if> exit exit </#if> </#list> exit
